component.name: Open Pawz Desktop
component.summary: Multi-agent AI desktop app — fully local, open source

description.p: OpenPawz is a fully local, multi-agent AI desktop app built with Tauri and Rust. It supports 10 AI providers, 11 channel bridges, hybrid memory with BM25 + vector search, and 10 security layers including prompt injection scanning, container sandboxing, TLS certificate pinning, and an encrypted credential vault.

Run multiple AI agents with custom personalities, models, and tool policies. Agents communicate across Telegram, Discord, IRC, Slack, Matrix, and more — all from a single desktop application with no cloud dependency.
